sect1.title: Push
sect1.para: Push Change to the other repository. You must push change to bare repository. If you push change to repository with working tree, there are unexpected result.

sect2.title: Branch
sect2.para: Local: The source branch which will push to other repository.
Remote: The remote branch of the other repository.

sect2.title: Destination
sect2.para: Arbitrary URL: The remote repository url.

sect2.title: Options
sect2.para: Force Overwrite Existing Branch(May discard changeds)
Use Thin Pack(For slow network connections)

tip.para: You can find more information about PuTTY and using ssh-keys at .

sect1.para: You can find more information at
